nodes.text: During the Separatist Crisis, the Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and his Padawan, Anakin Skywalker, were involved in a very important mission involving a border dispute on Ansion that left the galaxy staggered. Upon returning from the Ansion dispute, Skywalker and Kenobi became involved in trying to stop the plot to assassinate Padmé Amidala.

The border dispute on Ansion first appeared in The Approaching Storm, a 2002 Star Wars Legends novel written by Alan Dean Foster as a tie-in to the 2002 film Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. It became canon when it was mentioned in the aforementioned film.
